coreAttributes.name: slerm slime
coreAttributes.description: A small vial, containing slerm slime. Whilst not particularly nice to consume, it is extremely transformative. Luckily as a safety precaution, you have to enchant it for its transformative capabilities to take effect.

[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/2)]
